segments.text: Oh , honey . You came . I'm so glad ! Why are you wearing a bonnet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh , just for fun . Happy Easter , Mom . We got you these Easter lilies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're beautiful . Taylor , you're so pale and skinny !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I'm pale . It's just now the beginning of spring . I don't have my summer tan yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess . Are you sure you're taking care of yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm fine , Mom . Remember Holly ? This is her roommate , Yi-jun ..
segments.speaker: S2
